name: A Milkshake Maker Dessert Cooking Game! FREE
name_original: A Milkshake Maker Dessert Cooking Game! FREE
description:
Sweet, dreamy, creamy milkshakes. When you are craving one, nothing else will quite do.

Shake it up!

You don’t have to wait until your next fast food trip to enjoy a delicious, frothy milkshake. Why not whip out your iPhone or iPod and make your own?

The cool thing is that you can choose from Classic favorites with hundreds of mouth-watering variations or take it up a notch with your own custom shake!

Lots of fun choices...

91 tall frosty milkshake glasses. (7 different styles. 13 colors of each style)
36 of your all-time favorite ice cream flavors.
17 sauces and syrups.
15 flavors of whipped cream.
Chocolate, strawberry and vanilla milk.
9 types of juicy fruit and a staggering 38 different candies.

Fill your glass with deliciousness
Add your favorite milk flavor
Mix…Realistic 3 speed mixing
Garnish with candy, sprinkles and a thick cap of whipped cream
Drop in a colorful straw or 2 or 3..and sip that frothy, creamy, goodness...

Truly all-you-can-drink! Make as many refills as you want!

The most fun you’ll ever have making virtual milkshakes!

Buddy up and share with friends and family... and save to your photo library.

Are you up for the milkshake challenge?!
